answers.author: Barry Crook
answers.text:
From a previous posting in another forum:
Rick Morse wrote to the Citizen Engagement group in the Knowledge Network:
I've put together a resource page on citizens academies at http://www.sog.unc.edu/programs/citizensacademies/
It would be great if some of you who work with citizens academies would check out this site and offer any feedback. We are still adding and revising content and would welcome suggestions.
They have a great list of localities doing citizen academies.

author: Tony Mazzucco
text:
I am looking for any information anyone might have on what their municipality spends on Citizen Academies.  If the programs are done in house or contracted with an outside agency/academic institution, and any input from smaller municipalities that have created citizen academies.  Any help would be greatly appreciated!
Best,
